text: import-package in manifest.mf contains entries which prevent to add the log4j plug-in to the required plug-ins (Eclipse RCP 3.7.1). The log4j plug-in isn't shown in the dialog "Plug-in Selection" even though it exists in the defined target.
creator: jens.teutenberg@wincor-nixdorf.com

text:
I believe this is likely a duplicate of 43282 which is already fixed in SVN but hasn't made it into a release yet. Please see if that fixes the problem for you. If not, reopen the bug and provide more detail.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 43282 ***
creator: carnold@apache.org

text: How can I get the solution? I need a JAR.
